mapper.update: UPDATE futsalinformation SET futsalName = #{futsalName}, futsalPrice = #{futsalPrice}, futsalRegion = #{futsalRegion}, futsalAddress = #{futsalAddress}, futsalPhoneNumbar = #{futsalPhoneNumbar}, futsalBusinessHours = #{futsalBusinessHours}, futsalFacilityUsageRules = #{futsalFacilityUsageRules}, futsalCancellationPolicy = #{futsalCancellationPolicy} WHERE fiSeq = #{fiSeq}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.fiSeq, a.futsalName, a.futsalPrice, a.futsalRegion, a.futsalAddress, a.futsalPhoneNumbar, a.futsalBusinessHours, a.futsalFacilityUsageRules, a.futsalCancellationPolicy, region.cdSeq AS regionCdSeq, region.ifcdName AS regionName
FROM futsalinformation a LEFT JOIN code region ON a.futsalRegion = region.cdSeq WHERE 1=1 AND fiSeq = #{fiSeq}
